alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 27 at 12:56AM CST until November 27 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CST FOR SOUTHERN DALE...NORTHEASTERN GENEVA AND CENTRAL HOUSTON COUNTIES... At 1255 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Daleville to near Cottonwood, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Cottonwood, Dothan, Fort Rucker, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Avon, Napier Field and Memphis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
